ModMetaData.name: Daily VFE Patches/Luna的塔林原拓家具补丁
ModMetaData.author: 幽月琉璃Luna
ModMetaData.description: 为塔林家具与原版家具拓展（基础、太空）添加了卧室家具链接兼容性与皇权兼容性 [*] Mutual links for bedroom furniture (mainly beds) from Daily furniture and Vanilla Furniture Expanded. (Includes Core and Spacer Modules.) [*] Added Royalty DLC compatibility for Daily furniture. (Deluxe double beds are available for nobles, but require gold for crafting with Royalty.)
